name: Bowl 'Em Down
summary:
Have you ever wondered how a bowling ball feels as they roll down the lane? It's probably terrifying, so i would imagine you'd be screaming, right?
That's kinda what this game is all about.
Try to get a high score in this infinite, randomly generated bowling game.
Another twist is that when you fail a run you are prompted to scream to continue! You can do this infinitely as long as you scream louder than last time. You'll be managing your volume to get the most out of the feature and be screaming your lungs out by the end.
